name: PB_ACCT_TX_PLN_GRP
description: The PB_ACCT_TX_PLN_GRP table includes a list of employer groups associated with a premium billing account transaction.

columns.name: PB_ACT_TX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium account transaction.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Line counter of the employer group associated with the premium account transaction.

columns.name: PLAN_GRP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the employer group associated with the transaction.

columns.name: PLAN_GRP_ID_PLAN_GRP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the employer group record
